transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir call disconnect ho ja raha hai aapka.
Customer: Ji sir ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji to wahi keh raha tha ki last bar wahi 68000 tha sir aapka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir aagey jo usko sir main aapko bhej bhi deta hu performa jo last wala approve tha aapka 58000 kuch payment kiya tha aapne 1000 ka TDS tha aur aapka 9260 aapka purana jo bacha hua tha services usme se minus hua tha sir.
Customer: Wo 50000 plus 18000 18 59000 ho raha hai.
Executive: 59000 ho raha hai sir bas kar lena 59000 karwa dunga.
Customer: Sir without TrustSeal aa jayega utne mein sir jo aap mang rahe ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To kya fark padta hai.
Executive: BuyLeads ka fark padega sir aapko jaise.
Customer: Are ye to are ye to kuch bhi le lo agar aapke yahan support nahi hoga to kuch bhi nahi hota hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm kuch bhi le lo lekin aapke yahan support kahan hota hai na issue ye hai na.
Executive: To aap batao karayenge wo to kara lijiye wo to almost kara dunga utne mein sir aapka.
Customer: Kaun sa?
Executive: Without TrustSeal wala.
Customer: Is amount mein BuyLeads kam hoga.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Sir 6 mahine baad fir sochte hain.
Executive: To ek cheez kar sakte hain sir main aapse bas itna hi request karunga hamare sath jude rahiye ek saal ka jab aayega sir without TrustSeal 28000 ka aayega wo aap kara lo aur fir 6 mahine ke baad kabhi bhi aap usko change kara sakte ho ek bar maine aapko satisfied kar diya aapki inquiry calls BuyLeads sab mein aap isko upgrade kara lena 4 mahine ke andar kabhi bhi karaoge full amount adjustment ho jayega aapka full amount.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: March tak aap dekh lena abhi November chal raha hai December January February March theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai to fir March tak isi ko chalne do bina payment ka hi ek bar March tak dekhta hu kitni banti hai.
Executive: Bina payment ka thodi kuch hoga matlab main keh raha tha ki jo aapke jo aapke to IndiaMART mein bahut chalti hai na.
Customer: Nahi meri kyun chalegi sir main to main bhi to.
Customer: Nahi chalegi.
Executive: Employee hi hun na sir yahan ke.
Customer: Main March tak ye bhi dekh leta hu na ki aap yahan isi hamare account pe bane rahoge ki nahi.
Executive: Main rahunga sir main aapko main 100% surety deta hu uske.
Customer: Ha to fir kya dikkat hai yaar March tak.
Executive: To to are to payment to payment to karna hi hoga na free mein thodi chalegi sir aapko bhi pata hai service industry hai.
Customer: Abhi socho zara hum log hum log customer hoke 2 saal pehle paise de dete hain pata mujhe dete hain aap agle 23 mahine ka paise humse advance lete ho.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur hum bharosa karte hain aur IndiaMART ko hum pe bharosa nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo to main samajh raha hu na wo to main samajh hi raha hu to hota hi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi bhi samjhoge to bhi mera kam chal jayega.
Customer: Usme koi baat nahi.
Executive: Sir kuch to aap solution kuch to solution nikaliye sir yahi hai ki jitni aap aage aur agar negotiate karoge to 45000 plus GST chalu ho jayega aapka.
Customer: Sir kuch price nahi hai sir wo without TrustSeal ka amount mang rahe ho sir aap jo aap amount mang rahe ho.
Executive: TrustSeal ki koi issue nahi hai jo mera chal raha tha wahi dena padega aur 45000 plus GST mein chalu ho jayega.
Customer: Sir aapne.
Executive: Hamare Maurya sahab ne aaj isko discuss kiya tha bole aaj karte hain to karte hain nahi to kal se price ghata dena.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hamare jo board management hai unhone kaha ki 50000 plus GST mein aaj agar aaj kal mein karte hain to theek hai aur nahi to fir apna kam kar dena.
Customer: Management to sir management to aap hi ho Maurya sahab.
Executive: Are to hum ab akele thodi hun main.
Customer: Management to aap hi ho na management to aap hi ho.
Executive: Ha tabhi to keh raha hu.
Customer: Tab to aapko dekho WhatsApp bhi maine kiya last bar ka aapka adjustment hai 10000 aapne 58 59000 pay kiya tha.
Executive: 10 minute 10 minute daily 10 minute ka hi hai jyada nahi please isko na jyada lamba mat khecho.
Customer: 10 minute se jyada mat baat kara karo thoda sa wo.
Executive: Nahi 10 minute ka 5 minute bhi nahi baat kiya main keh raha hu kya kya.
Customer: 5 minute chalo chalo 5 minute aur reh gaye kar lo.
Executive: To aap mujhe batao to isko nishkarsh to nikalo sir aap matlab.
Customer: Are aapke yahan koi manega tab na yaar ab koi man hi nahi raha hai.
Executive: Sir aap manaiye na sir ji ye to dekho na ki aapka purana wala 10 68 jitna diya tha almost utna hi to aapse le raha hu sir 2 3000 jyada aur sath mein ek mahine extra sir itna hi le raha hu aapse baki thodi kuch le raha hu aapse extra.
Customer: 50000 plus GST.
Customer: Theek aur pichle saal jo hai 50 lead mili thi is saal 100 lead chahiye extra aur plus do mahina aur extra chahiye aur jitni isko lamba khechoge extra wala item aur badhta jayega aur extra paise lete jayenge.
Executive: Kis kis kis wajah se demand kar rahe ho to price hi nahi na sir ji.
Customer: Isliye band ho jayegi na.
Customer: Isliye demand kar raha hun ki ye ye customer support hame piche nahi mili thi cheating hui thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai is wajah se mujhe ek dam moh maya nahi hai ki aapke yahan account agar suspend ho jata hai to bhi mujhe koi dikkat hai.
Customer: Wo moh maya khatam ho chuka aap logo ki jo aap logo ki jo aadaten hain aapne itne din se baat kar rahe ho kisi senior authority se ab tak koi baat nahi karaya ki jisko main thodi mar sunaa saku jisko capacity ho sunne ki.
Executive: Sunaya hu to bataya nahi kisi ko.
Executive: Mujhse to baat kar hi rahe hain na sir aap.
Customer: Aap to dekho 15 din ke baad ki ji ye aapke account se main hat gaya hun sir aur main resign kar gaya hun aur ji chale gaye.
Executive: Sir meri team se hi log rahenge sir main kyun hat jaunga apni puri IndiaMART ki calling ki history dekho uske andar yahi hota hai.
Executive: Achcha ek cheez batao ek cheez main bata raha hu aapko ki main sir business manager hun jo bhi dekhte hain aap suno suno meri baat mujhe bataya ja raha hai 9000 9000 adjustment adjustment hua tha wo cheating hui thi.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: Mujhe ye bat bataya gaya tha ki aapka 50000 plus GST mein kar rahe hain hum.
Customer: Ab wo us bhasha ka main use nahi karna chahta jo teen mahine pehle tak karta tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: 40000 ka kam nahi hai ye wala.
Executive: Dekho price to jo hai wo company ka hi hai but wo performa maine aapko bheja hai.
Customer: To main kaun hun main kaun hun.
Executive: Nahi nahi price ki jo baat kar rahe hain 40000 ka ya fir 45000 ka price tumhari tumhari jo kam karoge wahi to paise de pa dunga main.
Customer: Ji wo main samajh gaya.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Maine aapko exact bataya ki 69000 ka tha maine aapko performa bhi bheja hai WhatsApp pe check kijiye adjustment ho raha hai.
Customer: Malum hai wo totally totally aap aap aap totally wo cheating kari gayi hai ab chalo dekhna ek bar 10 minute ho gaye honge to fir kal baat kar lenge.
Customer: Theek hai kal karte hain.
Executive: Theek hai sir baat kijiye kal.
summary:
Concerns:

- Call dropping frequently.

- Wants 100 leads extra and 2 months extra.

- Claims customer support was lacking previously.

- Alleges cheating in previous transactions.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a plan without TrustSeal.

- Executive mentioned full amount adjustment on upgrade.

- Executive stated the price is decided by management.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will decide by March.



Alert (If Any):

- complaint



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, trustseal, payment, adjustment, support
